name: Chital Rectangle Side Table
description: The Chital rectangle side table is both dramatic and organic its unique design. The black shagreen inlaid top sits on a pair of ethereal and sculptural bronze-patina brass legs. This piece makes for the perfect end table and is originally inspired by the Chital console. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. The finish of the shagreen is authentic as it is hand-dyed and the designer calls the finish look: "coal black shagreen."
